alert.note: Alert for Pulaski (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 05 at 8:44PM CDT until May 06 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri... Big Piney below Fort Leonard Wood -East Gate affecting Pulaski County. Gasconade River at Jerome affecting Phelps County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri... Roubidoux Creek Near Waynesville affecting Pulaski County. Gasconade River at Hazelgreen affecting Laclede County. For the Roubidoux Creek...including Waynesville...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Big Piney River...including Fort Leonard Wood - East Gate... Minor flooding is forecast. For the Gasconade River Basin...including Jerome, Hazelgreen...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Roubidoux Creek near Waynesville. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, the RV Park on the west side of Roubidoux in Waynesville just north of the Business 66 bridge floods. Spring Road near I-44 floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 9.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:30 PM CDT Thursday was 9.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 10.6 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Friday evening at 800 PM CDT.
